verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I heard ten thousand trumpets Sounding forth His glory.
I heard all heaven's angels lift their song on high.
I heard ten million voices praise the name of Jesus,
Filling all the throne room in the sky.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I heard from every nation a mighty
A mighty swelling chorus
I heard the song of the blood bought of Moses and the Lamb,
I heard the cry of triumph from saints down through the ages,
Filling all the throne room in the sky.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I heard the Lion of Judah.
I heard His voice of thunder.
I heard the mighty waters of God's eternal love.
I heard the overcomers shouting out His glory,
Filling all the throne room in the sky.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I heard God's new creation worship and adore Him.
I heard a pure, sweet language fill all the earth and sky.
I heard God's day of fullness being manifested,
Filling all the throne room in the sky.
